title: Bug 23787 [Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Integration build 09/17. Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: On motif platforms, the text fields in the Project Properties Info page automatically receive borders, identifying them as user input targets. Furthermore, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX, these fields have different colored backgrounds, making them stand out much more prominently.
EB: The Project Properties Info page on motif platforms should not use text fields with automatic borders. Additionally, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX, the text fields should have consistent background colors to maintain a visually cohesive appearance.
SR:
1. Open the Project Properties dialog on a motif platform.
2. Navigate to the Info page.
3. Observe the automatic borders around the text fields and the different colored backgrounds on Solaris/AIX/HPUX.
